text: Cospaia is an Italian hamlet (frazione) of the comune of San Giustino in the Province of Perugia, Umbria. ==History== The village was an independent republic from 1440 to 1826, when it was divided between the Grand Duchy of Tuscany and the Papal States. ==Geography== Cospaia is located in the northern suburbs of San Giustino, by a lake and next to the borders of Umbria with Tuscany. It is 3 km from Sansepolcro (in the Province of Arezzo), 15 from Città di Castello, 42 from Arezzo and 67 from Perugia. ==See also== *Republic of Senarica *List of historic states of Italy ==References== * * ==External links== *Thayer's Gazetteer *La storia ritrovata: La Repubblica di Cospaia *Cospaia: storia della repubblica più piccola al mondo *Flag of Cospaia Republic Category:Frazioni of the Province of Perugia
